21:39 <+jvelociter> vmassol: remember which browser re "pixels off in the magnifier in the search suggest:" ?  
21:40 <vmassol> jvelociter: chrome  
21:40 <+jvelociter> ok  
21:40 <+jvelociter> about "the fact that results are not returned", it's XPLUCENE-28  
21:41 <vmassol> so if I use "\*home\*" it should work?  
21:41 <vmassol> will try it  
21:41 <+jvelociter> the issue is not new, but the search suggest make it ore visible  
21:41 <+jvelociter> vmassol: you can't start a lucene query with \*  
21:41 <+jvelociter> unfortunately  
21:41 <+jvelociter> (and the search suggest automatically adds the one at the end  
21:41 <vmassol> ok… this issue is starting to be an important one  
21:41 <+jvelociter> so when you type "home", it "home\*"  
21:42 <vmassol> ok  
21:50 <vmassol> has quit
